divs: sighting detailsi\we were at home. window was open and noticed the fred\blue\green\white flashing colors not moving, hovering at first then making some small circular-like movements. i called the family when i first noticed it was flashing colors and not moving. it wasn't a plane or helicopter. there are many of those around here. no fear. interesting. it finally descended slowly in the northern direction.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tokyo
There were no other sightings in Tokyo on or around August 25th 2011
Summary: Family and friends witnessed this object.
